name: Multiple Select
description: The Multiple Select component can handle multiple selections.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to disable component.

properties.name: selectAllCheckbox
properties.label: Select All Checkbox
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add a checkbox that selects all options.

properties.name: selectAllLabel
properties.label: Select All Label
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a label for \"Select All Checkbox\" control.

properties.name: value
properties.label: Value
properties.settingTooltip: Enter the value separated by a comma.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add value by default.

properties.name: options
properties.label: Options
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to set options for the component.
properties.defaultValue:
[
  {"value": "Aston Martin Valkyrie", "label": "Aston Martin Valkyrie"},
  {"value": "Bugatti Chiron", "label": "Bugatti Chiron"},
  {"value": "Hennessey Venom GT", "label": "Hennessey Venom GT"},
  {"value": "Tesla Model 3", "label": "Tesla Model 3"},
  {"value": "Porsche Taycan", "label": "Porsche Taycan"}
]
